item.description:
Joint meetup meeting with the 7 Hills Camera Club. Will be held in the Saxe Room of the Worcester Public Library.
The first half will be their normal digital meeting and the second half will be held like our regular meetings.
I think this will be a wonderful chance for both of our groups to come together and discuss our favorite hobby/career.
Special thanks to Richard "Casey" Danek for helping put this together.

We look forward to seeing you all there.

Scott

Don't forget to bring some of your latest images and questions for the digital gurus.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: The Worcester Photography March Meetup
